job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Role: Data Scientist   Roles and ResponsibilitiesSuitable candidates will be part of Wipro Digital-Intelligent Enterprise practice. The role entails leveraging Data Science and Machine Learning to solve typical problems within an organization and create IP that could be deployed in a productized&nbsp;mode. This will entail significant hands-on work on multiple Big Data Technologies, Data Analysis, Identifying data patterns, ML models, Insights generation. The role entails deployment in a customer context and managing customer expectations. &nbsp;&nbsp;Technical Skills Required:·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hands on with Python or R·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Analytics using industry leading BI tools and technologies·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Implementation knowledge of supervised\un-supervised machine learning algorithms·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Good statistical analysis skills for data pre-processing and data wrangling·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Experienced in using big data frameworks like Hadoop·&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Knowledge of business intelligence tools or reporting tools &nbsp;Data Preparation for Modeling•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Missing Data Imputation,Outlier Treatment•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Scaling, Normalization, Standardization•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Encoding for Categorical Variables•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Oversampling\Undersampling for reducing class imbalance&nbsp;Experience in building solutions using Model Library•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Feature Selection•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Tree-based Ensemble Models•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Gradient\Adaptive Boosted Trees•&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Hyper-parameter tuning &nbsp;Building Prediction mechanisms using methods like Logistic regression, voting classifier stacking etc&nbsp;
